DOC.detailed_description: RCC cancer poorly understood . The increase incidence mortality rate RCC , couple lack effective therapy RCC beyond surgical excision , underscore need good understand RCC tumor biology , immunology , epidemiology . Such improved understanding could directly translate new prevention strategy well improve patient care . Recently , National Cancer Institute 's Kidney Cancer Progress Review Group identify top priority future research need good understand mechanism underlie know risk factor kidney cancer ; examine tumor tissue identify predictor patient outcome target therapy . In addition , review group stress leader renal cancer research next decade would institution could enroll large number patient , collect valuable risk factor quality life data patient harness late technology organize analyze data .
